title: Exponential Convergence-(t, s)-Weak Tractability of Approximation in Weighted Hilbert Spaces
content: We study L_2-approximation problems in the  weighted Hilbert spaces in the worst case setting. Three interesting weighted Hilbert spaces appear in this paper, whose weights  are equipped with two positive parameters $\ga_j$ and $\az_j$ for $j=1,\,2,\dots,\,d$. We consider the worst case error of algorithms that use finitely many arbitrary continuous linear functionals. We discuss the exponential convergence-(t,s)-weak tractability (EC-(t,s)-WT) of these L_2-approximation problems  under the absolute or normalized error criterion.
